statements: DELETE FROM government_projects WHERE project_name = 'Infrastructure Project';
DELETE FROM government_projects WHERE project_id = 100 AND project_name = 'Health Initiative';
DELETE FROM government_projects WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' AND budget > 1000000;
DELETE FROM government_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Safety Initiative';
DELETE FROM government_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
DELETE FROM government_projects WHERE project_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM project_evaluation WHERE outcome = 'Failed' AND evaluation_date > '2021-06-30'
